page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN MARSKE AREA.
page.content: Good community relations ensure that there is never anyone in need of transport. At least one car per family. Nearest garage is 5 miles. Bus Service - mainly school: one bus to Richmond in morning and one bus from Richmond in late afternoon, calls in at Marske village on weekdays only. There is an infrequent bus service running between Richmond and either Leyburn or Gunnerside on the A6108 road. This road is approximately 1 mile from our area. No bus between Marske & Marrick. Nearest Railway Station is 25 miles. Nearest Airport is 30 miles.
